title: 1878 Forbes Baseball Trade Cards for Sale
author: aelefson

posts.post_title: 1878 Forbes Baseball Trade Cards for Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi-

Below are scans of two 1878 Forbes trade cards for sale.  These were glued in an album back in the day and each has a glue type of stain on the back.  A Fly has a hole at the top (in the letter A) but both are otherwise nice with no creases.  I want 80.00 delivered for both cards.  Please let me know if you want them, need better scans, or if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Alan
[url]aelefson@hotmail.com[/url]

I will lower the price on the pair to 65.00 delivered.  Please let me know if you are interested.

Alan
